segments.text: This kitchen drawing captures everyday life gone wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman stands there, towel in hand, drying the plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her expression is blank, completely unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she miss the overflowing sink?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water pours out, flooding the area.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle touches her shoe, yet she ignores it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are raiding the cookie jar behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That boy's stool is about to give way.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's grabbing cookies like it's no big deal.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl assists by holding out her hand.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're breaking the rules, sneaking sweets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window overlooks a perfect garden scene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes the indoor mess even more frustrating.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I get so mad thinking about the potential slip and fall.
segments.speaker: PAR
